simulation-configuration.name: Answer Behavior Test
simulation-configuration.description: This scenario tests the answer behavior of the default subgoal-generation operator. The following list describes the questions: 1. info(test) answered with true, tests the answer to closed queries 2. info(X) answered with {info(test) or info(product)} test the answers to open queries 3. -info(test) answered with false, test negation is the same like 1 but the other way round. 4. info(worldformula) answered with unknown, test if the agent can communicate that they do not have any knowledge. 5. info(anything) the answer is true but the view on Bob is contradictory so the old information is replaced. If a belief change operator is used which can create contradictory belief bases then at this place the view on Bob becomes contradictory.
